title: A Cup of Silence
author: Ahmad
content: Sometimes peace comes in sips — a quiet morning, a hot drink, and thoughts unspoken.

title: Chasing Light
author: Adel
content: We’re all chasing something—success, love, meaning. But the real light might be in slowing down and feeling the sun on your face.

title: Unwritten Pages
author: Yusuf
content: Not every day needs a story. Some days are blank pages, and that’s okay too.

title: Late Night Tea
author: Ahmad
content: Tea tastes different when the world is quiet. It feels like a hug in a cup.

title: Digital Exhaustion
author: Moustafa
content: When was the last time you read something without clicking away halfway through?

title: Kindness Is Quiet
author: Moustafa
content: Kindness doesn’t always shout. Sometimes, it simply shows up.
